name: Borg Collective
declaringWar: We are the Borg. We will assimilate your technological knowledge. Your culture will adapt to service us. Resistance is futile
attacked: You have made the wrong decision. We will assimilate you. Resistance is futile
defeated: The Borg Collective has failed to find perfection. We hope that you will find it
introduction: I am the Borg Queen. I am the Borg Collective.
uniques: [-10]% Culture cost of adopting new Policies
